General.Name: Solid Automotive Bhd
General.Description: Solid Automotive Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the trading and distribution of automotive spare parts and components in Malaysia, the Middle East, Africa, and internationally. The company operates in three segments: Automotive Electrical Parts, Automotive Engine and Mechanical Parts, and Others. It also trades in and distributes automotive engines, mechanical parts and components, automotive batteries, lubricants, and industrial supplies for passenger and commercial vehicles. In addition, the company engages in property and investment holding activities, as well as provision of management services. Solid Automotive Berhad was founded in 1982 and is headquartered in Pasir Gudang, Malaysia.
